languages.text: "Я приметил самобытное изящество ваших картин еще на Эурак-V. Уверен, новое произведение получится не менее вдохновляющим".

traits.locale_text: "Я приметил самобытное изящество ваших картин еще на Эурак-V. Уверен, новое произведение получится не менее вдохновляющим".

languages.text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."
languages.original_text: "Я приметил самобытное изящество ваших картин еще на Эурак-V. Уверен, новое произведение получится не менее вдохновляющим".

traits.locale_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your newest piece will be just as breathtaking."
"I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your newest piece will be just as breathtaking."
"I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."
"I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."
"I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."

languages.text: “在欧拉克五号星站上，我对你那几幅别具一格作品印象深刻。我相信你的新作也一定十分出彩。”
languages.original_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."

traits.locale_text: “在欧拉克五号星上，我对你那几幅别具一格作品印象深刻。我相信你的新作也一定十分出彩。”

languages.text: "Mir ist auf Eurac V die Eleganz Eurer Werke aufgefallen. Euer jüngstes Werk wird gewiss ebenso atemberaubend sein."
languages.original_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist auf Eurac V die Eleganz Eurer Werke aufgefallen. Euer jüngstes Werk wird gewiss ebenso atemberaubend sein."

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas manqué de remarquer l'élégance unique de vos œuvres sur Eurac-V. Je suis {mf|sûr|sûre} que votre prochaine création sera tout aussi époustouflante. »
languages.original_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas manqué de remarquer l'élégance unique de vos œuvres sur Eurac-V. Je suis {mf|sûr|sûre} que votre prochaine création sera tout aussi époustouflante. »

languages.text: «Tomé nota de la elegancia única de sus obras en Eurac V. Estoy seguro de que su última pieza será igual de impresionante».
languages.original_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."

traits.locale_text: «Tomé nota de la elegancia única de sus obras en Eurac V. Estoy seguro de que su última pieza será igual de impresionante».

languages.text: 「私は、ユーラック・Vの背後にある、あなたの作品独自の優雅さに気付いた。あなたの最新作は、まさに息をのむほどのものだ」
languages.original_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、ユーラック・Vの背後にある、あなたの作品独自の優雅さに気付いた。あなたの最新作は、まさに息をのむほどのものだ」

languages.text: "Eurac V'teki eserlerinin zarafetini fark etmedim sanma. Bunun da en az onlar kadar nefes kesici olacağından eminim."
languages.original_text: "I did take note of the unique elegance of your works back on Eurac V. I am certain your latest piece will be just as breathtaking."
